featured.text: Roy Sullivan, a park ranger in the United States, was struck by lightning more recorded times than any other human being.
Finally, on 25 June 1977, a seventh and final bolt struck Sullivan as he was fishing in a pond.
Strike five occurred in 1973 when Sullivan was on patrol.

other.text: But after strike four, Sullivan became 23 death and took precautions during lightning strikes.
Sullivan, while surveying a campground, felt that a cloud was 24 him, and tried all he could to run— but it got him anyway.
Over his 36-year career, Sullivan was struck by lightning seven times—and 22 each shock!

definition.zh_def: 薩利文（Sullivan）是一個常見的姓氏，通常用於指代某個特定的人或家族。
definition.en_def: Sullivan is a common surname, often used to refer to a specific person or family.
definition.example: Sullivan is known for his contributions to the community.
